评论详情: The top of the dress runs big. I would have to wear a tank top underneath.  Love the material and it has pockets

Very nice sports dress made with light weight material. I wear this dress in the Florida heat and it’s perfect. Keep in mind it runs a bit large and has a wide waistband. I am 5’2” and 150lbs, the large was way too big,
Love this dress! Fit just a bit large under my arms but it was an easy alteration at the sewing machine. Will likely be buying additional colors!
This dress is so cute! It’s comfy, quick drying and lightweight. This is great for traveling. It does wrinkle, but the heat and humidity seems to iron it out. Very flattering!

This sport dress is comfortable, lightweight and cute. The material wicks the sweat. It keeps your body temperature feeling comfortable and cool. If you are petite the shoulders may be a little big , other than good quality.
Perfect for a cover up, trip to the beach or casual dinner.
This dress is comfortable,  washes well, line dry.
Perfect travel dress.

I purchased this dress on the off chance it could replace one of my brand name athleisure summer favorites and it did not disappoint. The fabric is the perfect weight for hot summer outdoor activities. It is breathable and dries quickly. the style of the dress allows for active movement, but also looks nice a little dressed up. It has a great V neckline that looks feminine and an adjustable waist and pockets. What more could you ask for? It fit true to size and the fabric has just a bit of stretch for movement.

Im a size 12, 38DD and ordered the large and was so pleased it fits great every where. The length is also just right. I like that it doesn’t look like a dry fit athletic item and isn’t clingy. Great quality.
Wonderful casual summer dress for everyday wear
Wash and wear, fairly wrinkle resistant. Good thickness and felt good wearing in 90 degree weather. Top runs a little big but gave it a more causal/relaxed look for me (5’7, 160lbs)

评论概述: Comfortable and cool on a hot day!
评论详情: This dress exceeded my expectations, the material keeps you cool on a hot day, the length was great (I’m 5’9”), I did wear biker type shorts underneath, but that is just preference for me, you wouldn’t need to. I have washed it and it came out great, no wrinkles.  Would be perfect to pack in a suitcase.  I ordered black and the color was perfect even after washing.
Very comfortable, sporty dress tjat can becworn with sandals or sneakers. Bought size S. I’m 5’7” 146 lbs, lafies size 6, 34D
This fabric seemed cheap.  There is no give and I imagine that it would wrinkle badly.  I wanted it for travel, but it will not work.

I was looking for a replacement for a swimsuit coverup that I loved. This is perfect. It is nice enough to wear alone as a casual/sporty dress and has that quick dry fabric so you can throw it on over a wet swimsuit for a beach/pool day.
The material on these dresses is smooth and SO comfortable. I received one as a gift and came back and bought another. Pockets are a plus!
Bought this to wear to the waterpark. Dries quickly, has pockets, loose fit....perfect for the pool!

I love this so much that I have it in two colors! It’s a great length- not to short so as a mom I can easily bend over in. It’s got room to move- not too tight, but not baggy and unflattering. I have dressed it up and down. Well worth the money!
I love this outfit. It fits perfectly and I get so many compliments!
Fit great, true to size, comfy and lightweight

I wanted to like this, but I returned them. I bought 2 different colors- black and the red/rose color both in small. I kept going back and forth about keeping or returning them because of how they fit. The waistband was thicker than I like and hit me on a weird part of my body which made the pockets kind of pop out. And the top tank top part was loose in the back for no reason.

I am ~5’ 3” and 130 lbs. I love this dress and it’s very flattering. Color is true to website description. I use for a swim cover up and to go places that I know I may get wet. It drys quickly and most times I can wipe it clean. It washes well and it’s a summer favorite.
Size medium. 5’4” and 148 lbs. D cup chest. Fits great. Medium might be a little loose in the top if you are small chested.

评论概述: Go to Disney in the heat dress
评论详情: This is my go to “Disney in the heat” dress. It’s also just a comfortable dress that you can dress up or down. I spent the day wandering around the parks & then wore it to a fancy dinner that night as well. You can dress it up or down. Girl code states that dresses that have pockets are far superior & this dress does not disappoint. I love this dress that when I have stuff in my pockets it doesn’t all slouch to one side bc of the tied waist. Black dress is a large and green is a medium. I like both fits for different reasons! Tempted to order the burnt orange color as well. 😬😅

评论概述: Cute dress but disappointed no built In shorts
评论详情: Would like to have shorts with it. No one golfs or plays tennis is a bare dress bending down sitting down. Would love to have short at least come with it if not Sewed in

This is such a fantastic, casual, dress in theory. I love the color I ordered the fabric feels wonderful. But unfortunately, without a size chart in the listing, it was hard to know what size to get. I have a smaller upper body with my measurements being 35 and a 28 inch waist but then my hips are a 40 or 41 so based on the pictures I could tell that the bottom was a little more slim so I ordered a large thinking I would just be able to cinch the waist. Well to cinch the waste by 10 inches obviously is not going to work. Super disappointed that there’s no size chart in the listing.
No matter the size this dress just doesn’t work for me.
Comfortable! Flattering! Fast drying. Can dress it up or wear it casual. I’m in love with this dress and have it in two colors.
I really wanted to like this dress, but it just fits weird on me. The top is so big with really big arm holes and the bottom fits a bit snug. I bought my normal size, medium.

This my go to dress for hitting the grocery store or running errands so I look like I made an effort.  It's roomy and comfy ans I like the drawstring to add some definition. Ordered a medium only because I didn't want it too short, but could have done a small. Happy with this jumper.

评论概述: sizing is pretty standard - roomy in the top
评论详情: i went to the RBX website and pulled a size chart and have put here in my review.  in reading some of the other reviews i noticed comments that it was larger in the top so i so decided to give it a go.  I am a D cup and i have plenty of room in the XL.  i am a bigger girl and sometimes in the sporty clothing i need a 2XL because I do not have an athlete's body.  so i was really happy with how well the XL fit.  Roomy up top and even with my pre-meno belly coming in, I am able to create a little bit of a blousey effect.  the fabric is SUPER lightweight which will be awesome on hot TX summer days.  It is a little shorter on me, so i will wear a pair of shorts with it, but there is plenty of space for them under.  pockets are amazing and the raceback gives it a more of the sporty look.  i am super pleased that i took a chance on the XL - it fits perfectly and will be a 'cool' addition to my summer wardrobe.  i am already picking out which planned activities i will be wearing it for.

This review is for the dress with the gathered waist and single waist tie.  I love this dress! I ordered it in all 3 colors.  The fit is flattering and true to size. The weight of the fabric is substantial enough for coverage but light enough for comfort in warm weather. I really like the cut of the dress - the back of the dress is slightly longer than the front for modesty.  For reference, I am 5'6" 128 lbs and ordered size small.  And it is quick-dry!

评论概述: Size was weird . Dress was good
